description:
Bet on Horse Racing, Greyhounds, Harness Racing and a huge range of Sports with Surge and electrify your punting experience.  

Surge is the ultimate racing and sports betting app, making it simple and easy for punters to place a horse racing or sports bet. With lightning-fast access to racing markets and all your favourite sports across Australia and around the globe, Surge is your go-to app for all things betting. Meaning this all-in-one platform will spark every punter's interest.

At Surge, we understand the importance of staying ahead of the game. That's why we have Sky Racing streaming live, free and fast on the app - so you can cheer on your selections on the go. We also developed our proprietary Market Mover technology, providing real-time insights into which horses are gaining traction in the betting markets. This cutting-edge feature gives the power to punters to make informed decisions, capitalising on market trends and staying ahead of the curve.

Electrify your experience by tracking your Same Game Multis during the game as stats update live on your bet (available on AFL, NFL and NBA). You can now also super charge your Same Game Multis by combining them in a Mega Multi, with up to a massive 40 legs, for bigger returns!

The Surge app boasts a sleek and intuitive design, allowing for seamless navigation through a wide range of online racing and sports markets. And we'll spark your interest with competitive odds and exclusive specials located on the promotions tab, meaning you'll have access to the best betting experience available.

Here's a glimpse of what Surge offers:

• Huge promotions including our massive opening specials!
• Sleek Design and Lightning-Fast Performance: A user-friendly interface combined with high-speed performance makes Surge the ultimate betting app.
• Give your odds a jolt by combining selections in a Same Race or Same Game Multi. 
• Use your Daily Promo Tokens on selected events of your choice giving you control of your promos outside of our daily offers.
• Watch live racing on the Surge app with Sky Racing streaming live and free.
• Apple Pay: Deposit lightning-fast and securely with Apple Pay.
• Comprehensive Racing Coverage: So you can dabble on Thoroughbred, harness, and greyhound racing from Australia and around the globe all at your fingertips.
• Market Mover Technology: A feature that enables you to identify trending horses in the market, allowing for smarter betting decisions.
• Competitive Odds and Daily Promotions: Surge offers the best odds and provides amped up special deals to enhance your betting experience.
• One-Touch Betting: Enable this feature to surge your bets to confirmation faster - so you'll never miss the jump.
• Sports Markets: If you love a sports bet then expand your wagering options with our huge variety of sports betting markets from across the globe.
• Same Game Multi Tracker: Track your multi live during the game with real-time stat updates (available on AFL, NFL and NBA).
• Mega Multis: A new feature that allows you to Multi your Same Game Multis with up to 40 legs for even bigger returns! 
• Daily Boost Tokens: Use these to increase your odds on sports or racing.

When you've got the bet urge, think Surge. Install the app today and tap into the electricity in the air pre-match or pre-race.


Surge is committed to responsible gambling, ensuring that our users can enjoy a safe and enjoyable betting experience every time. Please gamble responsibly. For gambling addiction help and support, please call 1800 858 858 or visit https://www.gamblinghelponline.org.au/

BetStop is the national self exclusion register - www.betstop.gov.au

18+ Gamble Responsibly.

FEEL THE SENSATION with BET NATION! The Bet Nation betting app is one of the superior betting apps on the market. Redesigned from the ground up – by punters for punters - it is jam packed with all the major features and specials to make it quick and easy to place any sports bet and horse racing bet around Australia, and the rest of the world!

Bet Nation is 100% Australian owned. This betting app gives you the easiest and fastest access to place your bets. Signing up is also fast and easy so you can get punting before you know it! 

HUGE DAILY SPECIALS – Not to be missed across Horse Racing, Greyhounds and sports like AFL, NBA, NRL, EPL, NFL and more! Just login to the Bet Nation app and get betting to see for yourself!

DAILY PROMO TOKENS - Apply your Daily Promo Tokens to selected events of your choice giving you control of your promos outside of our daily offers.

SAME GAME MULTI - Quickly place Same Game Multis on the AFL, NBA or the NRL to combine your odds. With our Mega Multi feature you can combine your SGM’s and have up to 40 legs in total to make your returns even more sensational! Tap on the game and select ‘same game multi’ to combine any outcomes in the same game. Leg 1, Leg 2, Leg 3.... and away you go! 

SAME GAME MULTI TRACKER - You can now follow the progress of your multi bet legs in-game as stats update live (available on AFL, NFL and NBA). 

SAME RACE MULTI - The Bet Nation app provides a huge Same Race Multi offering across greyhound and horse races. Build your own multi in one race and give yourself massive odds. You've got the chance to build huge same race multis with Bet Nation. It is super easy to use, allowing you to combine selections and boost your potential winnings.

MAJOR PUNTING TOOLS - Bet Nation also includes all the tools you need for placing bets: Fast Deposit, Speed Maps, Fluctuations, Comments, Career Form, Market Movers and much much more!

APPLE PAY – Deposit quickly and securely with Apple Pay.

DAILY BOOST TOKENS - Use Daily Tokens to boost your odds on sports or racing.

Time to Feel the Sensation with Bet Nation. Install the Bet Nation app now and log in for our HUGE DAILY SPECIALS!


Responsible Gambling: At Bet Nation we are dedicated to making betting a fun and enjoyable experience while protecting those with potential gambling issues. As such, we have a dedicated site you can refer to if you need support or having problems with gambling https://gambleresponsibly.betnation.com.au

Alternatively, for gambling addiction help and support, please call 1800 858 858 or visit https://www.gamblinghelponline.org.au

BetStop is the national self exclusion register - www.betstop.gov.au

18+ Gamble Responsibly.

Watch a huge range of sports Live & On-Demand including the biggest Aussie sports and the best from overseas.

- Every match of every round of AFL & NRL Live & Ad-Break Free During Play. All your favourite Fox Footy & Fox League news, analysis, and entertainment shows.
- Every Practice, Qualifier & Race of the F1®, Supercars and MotoGP Championships Live & Ad-Break Free During Racing.
- The best international and domestic cricket including every Australian Men's & Women's International Series on home soil, and every BBL and WBBL match Live & Ad-Break Free During Play.
- The best from the US with Live coverage of the NBA, NFL, NHL & MLB with ESPN.
- Live coverage of the NBL and WNBL with ESPN.
- Every game of the Suncorp Super Netball, plus every Australian Diamonds match Live.
- Over 100 hours of Live Coverage from every PGA Tour event, plus Every Round Live of all four Golf Majors and Live Coverage of LPGA events.
- Live UFC Fight Nights plus Pay-Per-View event press conferences, weigh-ins & prelim fights via ESPN on Kayo Sports.

Experience a new way to watch sport with game-changing features with the new Kayo Sports app, built for sport.

- Stories & Moments - Two exciting new ways to watch your favourite sports content, designed to keep you engaged and entertained.
- Key Moments – Whether you're catching up on a game or just want to watch the best parts, Key Moments give you quick access to all the highlights. Select from the video player timeline, it's easy to jump between any Key Moment.
- Minis – Want a comprehensive overview of a game or race in just a fraction of the time? Kayo Minis are replays that condense all the biggest moments into less than 30mins. Minis are available for every AFL, NRL, F1®, Supercars and MotoGP fixture plus ESPN Minis for selected NBA and NFL games available for 72hrs.
- No Spoilers – If you're running late, or your plans have gone off the rails, we've got your back by hiding the scores and results until you're ready. Just toggle Spoilers On/Off.
- Kayo Freebies – Join Freebies to watch our extensive range of free access content including live games, docos, entertainment shows and more.
- Continue Watching – Pause a live game and continue watching any time within the same viewing window, or for shows, we'll automatically save your viewing position so you can continue watching whenever you're ready.

Privacy Policy - https://help.kayosports.com.au/s/privacy-policy
Privacy Notice - https://help.kayosports.com.au/s/data-collection
Cookie Policy - https://help.kayosports.com.au/s/article/Cookie-Policy
Advertising Preferences and Opt-outs - https://help.kayosports.com.au/s/article/Hubbl-Advertising-Preferences-and-Opt-outs
Terms & Conditions - https://help.kayosports.com.au/s/terms-and-conditions

Australia’s favourite online betting app and entertainment site. Bet on everything with the Sportsbet app – from the next horse race, footy match, or greyhound race. Explore an online bookmaker loaded with tons of betting features providing the quickest, easiest and most secure way to bet.

Sportsbet has you covered across all your favourite markets from AFL, NRL, Horse Racing, NBA, EPL, Greyhounds & more.

Enhance your sports betting experience with our Same Game Multi & track your bets across live sports. Share the excitement with other punters when you join the Feed to copy and share bets.

Horse betting has never been easier with our in-app racing form and Same Race Multi. Seen a runner you like the look of? Quickly add it to your Blackbook to ensure you’ll never miss your favourite thoroughbred race again. 

We are the ultimate online gambling app with intuitive features and easy payment options.

Sportsbet Features

Horse Racing Betting
- Horse betting on Australian & New Zealand thoroughbred, greyhounds, and harness races.
- Same Race Multi: Bigger odds when you combine runners in the same race! Pick multiple horses to finish anywhere in the top 4 and get a fixed odds price before the jump
- Use our Blackbook for horse races and get SMS alerts for when your favourite is running next
- Following late money? Hit the flucs button on the racecard and even sort the card by the biggest movers. The more flames, the bigger the moves!

Unmatched Sports Betting
- SGM Tracker: Now available across both AFL,NRL & NBA - see how your multi's tracking live, in-game, all in one place
- Sports bets for AFL, NRL, EPL, NBA, MMA, Boxing, and more
- Same Game Multi lets you build your multi by combining selections from a single game

Online Betting, But Better
- Check out the Feed and copy & share bets with other punters
- For You – Jump into your favourite events instantly with the new homepage personalised just “for you”
- Bet With Mates by starting a group to share bets, earnings, and banter together
- Make easy, secure deposits and withdrawals with a wide range of options including Debit Cards, Apple Pay, PayID and PayPal
- With the Sportsbet Cash Card you can enjoy instant access to your winnings, draw cash from any ATM and use anywhere
- Enhanced Bet Slip Experience - Toggle legs on and off to quickly compare the odds of your multi!

Responsible Gambling: At Sportsbet we are committed to making sports betting a fun and entertaining experience while protecting those with potential gambling problems. You can enable Responsible Gambling options on mobile or desktop without having to speak with a Sportsbet customer service specialist.

Features such as Deposit Limits helps you to set a budget and control the amount of money deposited from your personal funds. It also helps you to use funds set aside only for gambling and not for other purposes to help you continue to gamble responsibly.

Get everything Sportsbet has to offer – local and international horse racing odds updated in real time, live betting & 1000+ sports betting markets including 200+ in AFL and NRL.
Download the Sportsbet app for quick and easy online betting, any time or place.

18+. Conditions apply – see sportsbet.com.au for details.

WHAT ARE YOU REALLY GAMBLING WITH? For free and confidential support call 1800 858 858 or visit http://www.gamblinghelponline.org.au
If you wish to talk to a Responsible Gambling Officer you can contact us on 1800 990 907. For more info please visit: https://responsiblegambling.sportsbet.com.au/hc/en-us  or https://www.gamblinghelponline.org.au/

BetStop - the National Self-Exclusion Register is a free Government service for people to exclude from all Australian online wagering providers at www.betstop.gov.au. Providers must not open an account for, allow bets from or market to registered persons.

Pump up the thrilling world of Horse Racing, Greyhounds, Harness Racing & Sports with NOISY and level up your betting experience. It’s time to bet NOISY people! 

NOISY is the next-gen sportsbet app designed to elevate every punter's game. Swiftly access thoroughbred, harness, greyhound racing and all your favourite sports, not only in Australia, but globally. Enjoy watching racing on the go with Sky Racing live streaming on the app. 

At NOISY, we believe in keeping the adrenaline pumping. Hence, our state-of-the-art Market Mover technology keeps you updated with real-time insights on trending horses in the betting space. Stay ahead, place smarter bets, and enjoy the thrill of watching your picks gain momentum. 

Combine runners in the same race for bigger odds with a Same Race Multi. Or get stuck into a Same Game Multi to amp up your potential returns. Turn up your experience by tracking the legs of your Same Game Multi in-game as stats update live (available on AFL, NFL and NBA). If that isn’t enough, our Mega Multi feature allows you to combine your SGM’s (up to 40 legs in total) to amplify those returns even more!

NOISY isn't just about making a noise; we are an app with substance. Our user-centric interface guarantees a smooth experience through diverse online racing and sports markets. Paired with our exclusive deals and competitive odds it’ll be sure to reverberate with all punters.

You’ll have a blast betting on NOISY: 

• Enjoy BANG ON Specials: You’ll get exceptional offers to kick things off located in the Promotions tab. 

• Watch Racing Live and Fast with Sky Racing Streaming Free on the app.

• Discover a Crisp Design with Turbo-Speed: Making NOISY your ultimate betting partner. 

• Quick Deposits: Enjoy hassle-free deposits via Apple Pay. 

• Top-tier Odds & Daily Promos: Dial up the fun with NOISY and keep your betting game elite.

• Daily Promo Tokens: Apply your Daily Promo Tokens to selected events of your choice giving you control of your promos outside of our daily offers.

• One-Click Betting: One tap and you're set, so you never miss the jump.

• Supercharge Your Odds: Our Same Race & Same Game Multi feature is here to amplify your potential returns.

• All-Access Racing: Have a dabble on Thoroughbred, harness and greyhound racing at your beck and call. 

• Market Mover Tech: Stay updated and make winning bets by following who is making a noise in the market. 

• Sports Markets: Enjoy a wide array of global sports betting options across NBA, NFL, EPL, Cricket, Tennis, Boxing and much much more.

• Live Same Game Multi Tracking: See the status of each leg of your multi is as stats update in-game. 

• Amplify your Multi: Our Mega Multi feature that allows to Multi your Same Game Multi’s - for even bigger returns!

• Boost Value: Use Daily Tokens to increase your odds on sports or racing.

It’s time to bet NOISY! Download the app now. 



NOISY is committed in promoting responsible gambling. We prioritise our users' safety and joy during every betting session. Please gamble responsibly. For gambling addiction help and support, please call 1800 858 858 or visit https://www.gamblinghelponline.org.au/ 

BetStop is the national self exclusion register - www.betstop.gov.au 

18+. Gamble Responsibly.

Your go-to betting app for Sports and Racing is BetDeluxe and it helps to take your punting to the next level! Back your favourites on the horses or on the sporting field with ease, while enjoying daily promos and specials tailored for you.

BetDeluxe is 100% Australian owned and operated, offering one of the widest ranges of betting markets in the game. Our goal? To truly deluxe your betting experience with an app stacked with smart features.

Why choose BetDeluxe?

Daily Specials – Horse Racing, Greyhounds, AFL, NBA, NRL, EPL, UFC, Boxing and more. Boost your returns with fresh promos every day.

Racing Markets Galore – Thoroughbred, harness and greyhounds, from Australia and abroad.

Sports Markets Covered – From footy to cricket, golf to motorsport, we’ve got all the action here and overseas.

Same Race Multi – Build your own multi in one race across greyhounds or horses for massive odds. Easy, quick, powerful.

Same Game Multi – Take your AFL, NBA or NRL bet to the extreme with our Mega Multi feature (up to 40 legs!).

Multi Tracker – Follow your Same Game Multis live (AFL, NBA, NFL) with our SGM Bet Tracker.

Daily Boost Tokens – Give your odds an extra kick on racing or sports.

Daily Promo Tokens – Take control of your promos and use them where you want.

Punters Tools – Form guides, runner comments, speed maps and market fluctuations to help you bet smarter.

Market Movers Tech – Track trends and see where the smart money is going.

Apple Pay Ready – Fast, secure deposits.

Cash Out your Bets - Lock in profits early or cut any potential losses with this feature.

You’re on a winner with BetDeluxe. Download the app today and deluxe your punting experience.

This is a real money gambling app. Please gamble responsibly. 

At BetDeluxe we are dedicated to making betting a fun and enjoyable experience while protecting those with potential gambling issues. For gambling addiction help and support, please call 1800 858 858 or visit https://www.gamblinghelponline.org.au/

Welcome to bet365’s most advanced sports betting app yet! Available on mobile and tablet. Download the betting app today and find out why it’s Never Ordinary at bet365.

Official Global Partner of the UEFA Champions League

Bet on a wide range of In-Play and pre-match sports including Premier League, Melbourne Cup, Big Bash and UEFA Champions League.

bet365 customers can enjoy an unrivalled user experience including:

· Quick Code: Place In-Play single and Multi bets on the phone, as the action unfolds and take advantage of an extensive range of In-Play markets.

· Same Game Multi+: Combine the most popular markets from selected events into one bet. Our user-friendly interface has everything in one place so you can create the bet you want.

· Live Streaming: bet365 streams hundreds of thousands of events worldwide every year, bringing top quality live sporting action straight to your device wherever you are. Featuring events globally from major Soccer leagues, the NBA, NFL & more.

· Match Live: Follow In-Play events in real time and monitor your bets and stats as the action unfolds. Available on a wide range of fantastic sports.

· My Alerts: Receive tailored bet and live sports event alerts straight to your mobile or tablet.

· Horse Racing Live Streaming: Bet & Watch as the action unfolds on a wide range of meetings from across Australia, including racing from Queensland, Victoria and South Australia.

· Horse Racing Form: Study the form on every Australian Horse Race.

· Sports Stats: Study the stats for major competitions across the globe including Footy, League and Cricket.

· Personalised Display: Easily navigate to your preferred sports as our intuitive App will show you the type of sports you bet on. You can also favourite specific sports via the A-Z Sports menu for easy access.

· Search: Use our search facility to quickly find the sport, league, event or market you want to bet on.

· Sports Betting & News: Keep up to date with the very latest news across a wide range of sports and get extra betting insights from our talent and tipsters.

· bet365 Extra: View all of our available offers and promotions, including information on how your bets can qualify.

· Choose from a wide range of payment methods including Debit Card, PayPal and Apple Pay.

· Use your existing bet365 account or sign up via the app.

You must be 18 or over to have a bet365 account.

Availability may differ by location.

Tell us what you think, rate our app today!

The features listed above are available to users residing in Australia and New Zealand - availability may differ in other localities.

Please read the bet365 Privacy Policy (see link below) before installing this application. By installing and opening the application you are accepting this policy.

bet365 is committed to Responsible Gambling.
We have a range of tools available that are designed to help you to stay in control of your betting such as Time-Outs, Deposit Limits, Reality Checks, Self-Exclusion and others.

WHAT ARE YOU PREPARED TO LOSE TODAY?

For customers in Australia additional support and advice can be found at www.gamblinghelponline.org.au or by calling 1800 858 858.

The Big Bash app is the official home of the BBL and WBBL. Keep up with all the action on field and go behind the scenes of the world's best cricket league.

Features:
- Live scores, stats, ladders & fixtures
- Personalised experiences based on your favourite teams and players
- Exclusive behind the scenes video stories and moments from across the league
- Video highlights & wicket replays  
- Breaking news & match reports

Teamworks is The Operating System for Sports™, connecting the best in sports technology and home to best-in-class products for each stage of the athlete lifecycle. It’s ONE complete solution that connects, focuses, and empowers staff, coaches, and athletes to drive holistic performance. Wherever your athletes and staff may be, empower them with the information they need to manage their responsibilities on and off the field.

- Timely news feed
- Robust in-app messaging with SMS fallback
- Team and individual calendars 
- Consolidated task lists
- Video, photo, and file upload
- Form completion
- Travel itineraries
- Access to other Teamworks products


Note: You must have a Teamworks account to access the Teamworks app.

Teampay (powered by PlayHQ) is transforming how community sports teams manage and pay their fees.

With Teampay’s intuitive app, teams can pay game fees in seconds — with payments sent directly to the organisation.

Tired of chasing teammates or parents for money? Teampay eliminates the hassle by making it fast and easy to collect player fees, so you can focus more on the game and less on the follow-up.

Need to manage more than just game fees? Teampay also covers forfeits, nomination fees, team bonds, and more — all in one convenient place.

Featured by Apple as 'The best app for golfers'! Join millions of golfers using 18Birdies to shoot lower scores with the help of our breakthrough game improvement tools. Get incredibly accurate distances for how far to hit every shot at courses worldwide. View 3D Green Maps to help you read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  See how far every shot you hit goes during a round and track performance & progress with a digital scorecard. You'll even get suggestions on how to improve based on how your stats compare to other golfers in your skill level. Create tournaments for groups of friends, get swing tips and share your love of golf with friends.  

Using 18Birdies is like having a Tour-level caddy and GPS rangefinder in your pocket. Play every hole like a pro with accurate “Plays Like" distances based on elevation change, wind, rain, temperature, and more.

Looking to improve your game? Upload a video of your swing to AI Coach and get instant feedback on what swing faults to focus on with custom video tips walking you through exactly how to fix those swing faults.  It's like a coach in your pocket, anytime you need swing advice AI Coach is there to help. 

Make the most out of your practice sessions with 18Birdies. Compare stats with other players in your skill level to help you figure out how to improve faster.

FREE FEATURES:

-GPS RANGEFINDER: Find your distance from anywhere on the course.
-STATS & ROUND HISTORY: Track your stats in a few taps and view all your past rounds – forever.
-HANDICAP: Track how your game is trending.
-AUTO HOLE SWITCHING: Less taps, more golfs.
-SIDE GAMES: Let us do the math and keep track of those side bets. Play 9 different games like Skins, Wolf, Dots, and Points for free!
-SOCIAL FEED: Share swing videos, talk equipment, and celebrate hole-in-ones and more with other golfers from around the world.

PREMIUM FEATURES:

*Access a FREE trial after you download the app

-3D GREEN MAPS: Read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  
-CADDY+: Get personalized distance and club recommendations based on elevation, temperature, humidity, wind data  and more.
-ADVANCED STATS: Analyze your golf game with even more charts and custom filters.
-SHOT TRACKING: Our most popular feature! Track and get a snapshot of your shots based on distance, shot shape, quality, and power.
-STROKES GAINED: With strokes gained scoring, you can find out where you are losing or gaining strokes against the field – just like the pros!

LOVE THE APP?
Rate us!

SUPPORT
Don’t see your course in our database, want to learn more about our features, or just want to share your feedback? We love hearing from you, so go ahead and shoot us an email at support@18Birdies.com – and we’ll get back to you pronto.


PAYMENT INFORMATION
In addition to our free app, we offer three types of Premium membership: Weekly, Monthly and Annual.  All subscriptions and payments are offered via in-app purchase and will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as we confirm the purchase. All subscriptions auto-renew, unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your selected subscription duration. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, depending on the option you have selected. All subscriptions can be managed through the App Store. Note: If you upgrade to Premium before the end of your free trial, any unused portion of the trial will be forfeited. For more information, please review the 18Birdies Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions below.

NOTE
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. But 18Birdies has a low battery mode to save your battery on the course.

TERMS OF SERVICE
https://18birdies.com/legal/terms/

GOOGLE MAPS TERMS & PRIVACY
https://www.google.com/policies/terms/
https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/

Dabble - You Better Believe It 

Bored with other bookies? Congratulations, you’ve found us! Dabble is here to revolutionise your betting experience with a massive line-up of social first features - you better believe it. Whether you love horse racing, footy, greyhounds, or MMA - betting is way more fun on Dabble!

Here at Dabble, we work around the clock to make sure that we give our Dabblers (you) the best social betting experience! With a series of social first features, Dabble is here to rock your world - you better believe it. 

FAST WITHDRAWALS
Experience rapid winnings directly to your wallet! Dabble boasts an impressive withdrawal time of only 8.74 seconds*. To put this into perspective, it's quicker than the fastest try in an NRL game and the fastest goal from a centre bounce in the footy. 

REAL CASH
We understand the thrill of the game and the disappointment if a leg loses on your multi. That’s why Dabble pays real cash on refunds, not bonus bets or bonus cash. Yes, real cash! Don’t worry, Dabble has your back, you better believe it!

SAME GAME MULTIS & TRACKER
We’ve got SGMs! Combine your SGMs to multiple your odds. Build your own multi or copy your best mates - and don’t forget to track your player props during the match with our SGM Tracker, available for NBA, Footy, and more.

COPY BET
Dabble is the home to the iconic Copy Bet. Spot a bet you likey? Hit that copy bet button and you’re on your way to victory - you better believe it!

THE FEED
Stay up to date with your mates' bets and keep ahead of the game with our dynamic social feed. Plus, Dabble’s new FOR YOU feed displays trending and next to go bets for sport and racing from profiles that you haven’t discovered yet! BANG!

FOLLOW OTHER PUNTERS & DISCOVER PROFILES
Follow anyone from your best mates to sports stars like Heath Shaw, Dane Swan and more. Use the Discover Tab to find trending Dabblers and see who is on a winning streak or rising to game in the Dabble community. 

RACING FORM
Elevate your racing experience with racing form. Racing form equips you with everything you need to make informed betting decisions. Get detailed information around the runners, jockeys, flucs, and stats. Bet smarter and ride to victory with Racing Form.

GROUP CHATS
Think Dabble couldn’t get any better? You better believe it! You now can create your very own group chats with other Dabblers! You can send instant messages, share and copy each other's bets within the groups and debrief after the big game (or during, if that’s your style)!

BANTER CHANNELS
Banter that’s as money as J-Mac at Sha Tin? You better believe it! Join our Banter Channels to chat and cheer (or complain) with the Dabble community. Unique pop-up channels for niche sports enthusiasts, reality TV tragics, and trending topics make banter that much better!

LIVE STREAMS
Tune into weekly live streams featuring 25+ sports stars and personalities. Grab their hot tips for the week and stay updated on everything happening in the world of Dabble. You better believe that it is only on Dabble!

SKY RACING VISION
Never miss a moment as you cheer on your favorite horses and greyhounds live, all from the palm of your hand.

YOU BETTER BELIEVE DABBLE HAS ALL YOUR FAVE SPORTS IN ONE PLACE
We have the best banter, tips & betting markets on all your fave sports & codes:
- Tennis
- NRL
- Footy
- MLB
- Esports
- Football / Soccer
- Motorsports 
- Horse racing
- Greyhound racing
- MMA, UFC & more!

RESPONSIBLE GAMBLING
At Dabble, we take responsible gambling seriously & implement extra measures beyond what is required, including mandatory deposit limits for anyone under 25 & you can easily Take A Break. We are committed to making sports betting a fun & entertaining experience while protecting those with potential gambling problems. 

What are you really gambling with? For free and confidential support call 1800 858 858 or visit gamblinghelponline.org.au.

DOWNLOAD THE DABBLE BETTING APP TODAY.

Introducing the official mobile App for everyone involved in Community Basketball.

MyHoops is a free iOS App built for community basketball fans, housing fixtures, ladders, results, and statistics for leagues operating on PlayHQ.
With MyHoops, community basketball fans can favourite players, teams, clubs, grades and leagues, giving fans quick and easy access to the players and games they care about most.

MyHoops’ user-friendly interface is designed with the community basketball fan in mind, no matter where they are, so that they can stay connected to games and players anywhere, anytime.

Download the MyHoops iOS App today.

Stack Team App is a FREE and secure platform enabling any sports team or club to create their own customisable smartphone app. It also includes a free website that updates dynamically with your app.  

If your Team has created an app then download Stack Team App, sign-up and join your team. To create your own Stack Team App visit www.teamapp.com, or create your team directly via the app.

Stack Team App is one of the world’s premier smartphone apps for sports club communication used by millions of people in over 150 countries!

QUICK SUMMARY

Stack Team App is suitable for anyone from small social teams to large clubs with thousands of members. Engage with members, coaches and players with your choice of features:

APP FEATURES

• Send news, events, photos and videos instantly to your members' smartphone via push notifications.
• Promote events, send reminders, manage RSVP’s and track attendances.
• Instantly create and receive in-app payments from members using the Team Payments feature.
• Create separate access groups such as players, parents and coaches to streamline communication.
• Sell mobile tickets, merchandise & memberships directly via the Store in your app or website.
• Engage in instant private messaging or group chats.
• Create surveys or in-app voting to gather information from your members.
• Send newsletters & documents.
• Link your app to ladders, schedules, results & live scores for multiple teams.
• Sync your team’s events with your smartphone calendar.
• Easily invite members via the app, or bulk upload your database via your team’s website dashboard.
• Secure and private platform so you decide who receives your content.

NEW REVENUE CHANNEL

• Buy your own ad banners to support sponsors and make a profit for your club.
• Sell mobile tickets, memberships and merchandise via the Store in your app or website.
• Utilise Team Payments to request instant in-app payments from members.
• Promote events to maximise attendances to generate greater revenue.

PROFESSIONALISM

Stack Team App’s features and commercial opportunities will bring an entirely new level of professionalism to any club, no matter how small or large.  

AUTO-RENEWABLE 12-MONTH SUBSCRIPTION TO REMOVE ADS

Stack Team App's innovation and development is funded by mobile advertising, ensuring you and your team can enjoy Stack Team App for free. We take care not to upset or interrupt the user experience. 
However, if you want to remove the ads from Stack Team App, you can "Remove Ads" via an in-app purchase through the settings of your Stack Team App. It is a 12-month subscription and will auto-renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period - auto-renewal is managed via your iTunes account settings after your purchase. Pricing is USD $2.99 / AUD $4.49 per year, and will be charged to your iTunes Account. 

PRIVACY POLICY

https://teamapp.com/privacy

TERMS OF SERVICE

https://teamapp.com/terms

Bring your club into the mobile age with Stack Team App.
Your Team. Your App.

Heja is the simple and modern way to manage your sports team. It keeps everyone informed with a clear team schedule, availability RSVPs, automatic reminders, and group text messaging, including video and photo sharing.

Heja helps teams connect and grow together in a shared love for team sports. Trusted by more than 1.8 million coaches, players, parents, and volunteers worldwide!

SCHEDULE YOUR SEASON
Schedule games and practices with automatic reminders to parents and players. Heja helps you stay organized throughout the season.

TRACK PLAYER AVAILABILITY
Stay on top of who’s coming to games and practices - even if plans change. Whether someone’s sick, running late, or away, Heja keeps coaches informed and reminds players and parents to reply.

CHILD SAFEGUARDING
Safety is our top priority. Heja includes child safeguarding features to prevent adult–minor contact without a parent’s knowledge.

MESSAGING 
Send messages to individual team members, groups, or the entire team — it's up to you to decide. SEE WHO'S READ YOUR MESSAGE!

ANNOUNCEMENTS 
Cut through the noise and make sure your message reaches everyone on your team instantly.

MANAGE MULTIPLE TEAMS 
Coach or play on several teams? Heja makes it simple for coaches, parents, or players to be part of more than one team — keeping all team info in one easy-to-find place!

SHARE VIDEOS AND IMAGES
The safe and secure way to share photos of the team from practice or post strategies ahead of the game. Heja allows you to upload photos and videos directly from your pocket!

FUNDRAISING MADE SIMPLE
Create a fundraiser in minutes - no fees, no inventory, no hassle. Each player gets their own personal webshop with a goal, and supporters can shop directly from their link. As everyone tracks their progress, the team’s goal grows together. It’s simple, fast, and all in Heja.

ALL CONTACTS IN ONE PLACE
Store all the contact details for everyone on the team in one place with easy accessibility. Parents can arrange rides to practice and divide team responsibilities. Everything doesn't have to go through the coach!

FREE TO USE
That’s right. Heja is free for everyone on the team to use, with no limit to how many players and parents or guardians there are on the team.

ADVANCED FEATURES WITH HEJA PRO
Want more from Heja? Unlock Heja Pro to access attendance stats, payment tracking, unlimited admin roles, desktop access, RSVP updates, powerful reminders, and an ad-free experience for coaches and admins. It’s available through in-app purchases.

ABOUT HEJA 
We want to make it possible for every child in the world to experience the joys of team sports, from building friendships to bridging cultures and boosting health. That's what we believe in. Through Heja, we make it simple and accessible for everyone — including coaches, families, and players — to be part of a well-run sports team.

PRIVACY
More than 235,000 teams trust Heja for their internal communications. We don't take that trust lightly and care a lot about your privacy. Read our privacy policy here: https://heja.io/privacy 

Read about Heja's terms of service here: https://heja.io/terms

Fish smarter with Fishbrain! Find new fishing spots, get detailed local info, and connect with a community of more than 20 million anglers. Fishbrain provides you with the maps and tools you need to improve your fishing skills.

FIND NEW FISHING SPOTS
Fishbrain is the fastest and easiest way to find places to fish. Explore thousands of fishing waters and see exactly where fish are being caught with the Fishbrain map. Take your scouting to the next level with advanced map layers and customization options. Whether you’re fishing for bass, trout, catfish, redfish, or any other species, Fishbrain can help you set the hook.

GET THE LATEST LOCAL INFO
Be the first to know about fishing trends in your area. Get pictures and updates from local anglers. See which baits & lures are catching the most fish. Check weather conditions, tide charts, air pressure, moon phases, and advanced BiteTime forecasts. Search updated local fishing regulations in 25+ US states.

TRACK YOUR FISHING ADVENTURES
Keep track of your fishing trips to unlock personalized insights and tips. Log catches to remember the baits and weather patterns that led to success. Record all your favorite fishing moments, and share your catches with the community to celebrate with your fellow anglers.

KEEP YOUR SPOTS SECRET
You control how much location info you share! Fishbrain’s built-in privacy settings ensure you can keep info about your favorite fishing spots private.

CONNECT WITH LIKE-MINDED ANGLERS
Fishing is better with friends, old and new. Fishbrain brings together passionate anglers from around the globe. Connect with other fishing enthusiasts, exchange tips & tricks, join fishing groups, learn new fishing techniques and so much more.

FISHBRAIN APP FEATURES 
 • Fishing maps with advanced map layers & filters
 • Find potential fishing access with the "Parks & Government Land" map layer
 • Detailed info on fishing waters, including recent photos & catch reports
 • Depth charts from Garmin Navionics (USA & Canada) and C-Map Social
 • “Top Baits” recommendations based on community reports
 • BiteTime fishing forecasts powered by advanced AI
 • Weather conditions, tide charts, air pressure, moon phases and more
 • Fishing logbook with personal stats & fishing insights
 • Private waypoints to keep track of your favorite fishing spots
 • Markers for boat ramps, tackle shops, and other points of interest
 • Fish ID tool that can identify 300+ species
 • Social community with over 15 million members
 • Local fishing rules and regulations in 30+ US states

GET MORE WITH FISHBRAIN PRO
The Fishbrain app is free to download and use. Upgrade to Fishbrain Pro to unlock all the most advanced features. Fishbrain Pro makes finding your next fishing spot even easier, and gives you all the data you need to make great decisions about where to go fishing.

Whether you’re a beginner just learning how to fish, or an experienced angler chasing your next PB, Fishbrain will help you along your journey as an angler! Download Fishbrain today and start knowing the water like never before.
